headline: BioNTech: Maintaining "Strong Buy" After Part 1 Success Of Next-Gen Anti-CTLA-4 Gotistobart
summary: BioNTech stock is a "Strong Buy", driven by positive phase 3 data for gotistobart in 2nd-line squamous NSCLC patients. Read the full analysis here.

headline: Pfizer Turns to China for Trial Weight Loss Drug. Congress Is Worried About Chinese Biotechs.
summary: Big American drugmakers are hunting for novel weight loss drugs in the labs of China’s biotech industry, while U.S. authorities try to undercut the growing Chinese biotech sector.

raw.headline: Pfizer Turns to China for Trial Weight Loss Drug. Congress Is Worried About Chinese Biotechs.
raw.summary: Big American drugmakers are hunting for novel weight loss drugs in the labs of China’s biotech industry, while U.S. authorities try to undercut the growing Chinese biotech sector.

headline: ​Sanofi (SNY) Completes the Acquisition of Vicebio
summary: ​Sanofi (NASDAQ:SNY) is one of the Cheap NASDAQ Stocks to Buy Now. On December 4, Sanofi (NASDAQ:SNY) announced the completion of the Vicebio acquisition. Vicebio is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on developing transformative multi-pathogen vaccines for respiratory viral infections. ​Management noted that this strategic acquisition brings Vicebio’s early-stage vaccine candidate for respiratory syncytial virus […]
